name: The Impossible Game
description: The super-addictive and very, very hard platform game finally arrives on Steam - it's quite possibly the world's hardest game! As well as five classic Impossible Game levels, this desktop version includes an EXCLUSIVE new Level Editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I quite enjoy bouncing suicidal squares on their voyage to death. SPOILERS: This game is Impossible. Space Bar BE WARNED!  10/10 Would throw my PC out the window again. Would play again too.
Frustrating, but not impossible!  7/10

Day One, Hour One: I bought the game that I saw YouTubers play. So let's get started... Day One, Hour Three: Okay, this is quite difficult... Day One, Hour Seven: @@@@! Another spike? This @@@@ing game! I swear to god! Day Two, Hour Eight: Yes one last jump and... FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU Day Four, Hour Nine: Finally beat the original level and level one! Now let's see level two! Day Four, Hour Ten: IT @@@@ING GOES UPSIDE DOWN?! @@@@! Day Five, Hour Twelve: @@@@ your mother! @@@@ your sister! I HOPE YOUR CHILDREN DIE OF SUPER MAGA AIDS AFTER THEY DEVELOP CANCER IN A RADIATION TOURTURE CAMP!!!!!!! Day Six, Hour Fourteen: ... Day Six, Hour Fifteen: ... Day Six, Hour Sixteen: ... *sigh* Day Seven, Hour Seventeen: Okay after days of practice, and endless days of tourture, I beat Level 2... Day Eight, Hour Twenty: I hate my life... Day Ten, Hour Twenty-One: Thank god! One more level! Day Ten, Hour Twenty-Two: ... @@@@ this...  10/10 Would destroy my computer about three more times...
Addictive, infuriating, impossible, i love it

Overall, this is a simple and fun game that you can play and enjoy. However, I've become super frustrated dozens of times due to the fact that the object I'm controlling just randomly bugs out, causing me to fail. When I go to jump, he jumps super high for no reason, and I crash into a block above me. Other times, he doesn't jump at all. The first few times it happened, I thought to myself, 'You know what, it was probably just me'. However, it continued to happen over and over again, and upon restarting, the block would be freaking out in mid-air as the level starts.  As said before, this game is still fun and enjoyable, but it has some issues. I'd definitely pick it up on sale, though.

Challenging and fun at the same time. Still on the first level, but my daughter loves watching me try and 'get over the spikes!' She also loves to dance with the music which is awesome I must say. Thanks for a great game!  Recommended if you like a challenge and good music.
I reccomend this game because it makes you rage. BUT, you can try the game Geometry dash to improve. It's free on the app store. There's only 1 problem. ITS ADDICTING!!!

Minimalistic game. You are a square and you try to avoid any obstacle in your way, if you touch anything you are not supposed to, you die and get back to the start of the level.  The game itself ist that hard as the name states, you have a set pattern of objects, since you cant stop, you are probably die the first couple of times you go trough them, but after you memorize them, its pretty straight forward.  It does have however, artificial difficulty, very noticeable when switching from auto jumps to manual jumps. The game adds some obstacles where you only have half of a square to land and some (a lot of) times it does a slide to your death instead of jumping. i can differenciate when i ♥♥♥♥ up and when the controls didnt responded.  It has some neat music that set you in the mood.  I guess its allright, i can recommend it since its fun and cheap but by no means its more fun or harder than super hexagon.
this game is good! i beat fire aura and original level without flags, i like this game
That game is SO ♥♥♥♥ING HARD !~!~!
Nice game and soundtrack as well, you should really buy this one if you like the genre or want to try something different.
Ordinary game so many emotions and nerves. I went through this game on my phone, and now in Steam)))
I think I should thank the authors to have built only one button : it's hard enough that way.
This looks easy -- famous last words
this can ♥♥♥♥ off. but me gusta

Do you have quick reflexes A sharp eye? A powerful sense of patience and an unquenchable tolerance for failure, good music, and unique challenges? Then this is the game for you!  Are you a sausage-fingered prat who has cheeto dust all over his shirt, and the grace and skill of a drunken platypus? Don't play this game. You'll only whine about it being 'too hard' despite the fact that the name alone tells you the difficulty you should be bracing yourself for.
Never managed to break 2 keyboards in 0.1 hours. 10/10
I cant recommend a game that supports false advertising. I was promised it was impossible instead I beat the first level after 5 hours and 23 minutes and 486 attempts.
Adicting  Fun  Frustrating   Just play and never stop playing cause : U JUST HAVE TO FINISH THAT LEVEL !!!

A great game if you enjoy breaking stuff.
This game causes insanity. But I love it. 10/10

okay writing review about this hmm great game well at first before playing  +remove all sharp objects from your table (its not joke after 30 min of play you will know why) +make sure nothig expensive is near you  okay after doing this its game time  +the soudtrack of this game very good and addictive +well then name suits game  +achievements are pretty easy (when u play with flags) +this game teach your speed on keyboard +this game teach you a new types of swearing( make sure noone is your roomwhen ou play this game)   about bad things (well some call it bad but i dont) +its addictive +its make you agressive  BUY THIS GAME AND LEARN A NEW WAY OF LIFE
Great Game

This is a rage inducing, drive you mad crazy, and most of all, an Impossibly hard game to play! But the most important feature of any type of rage game is, that it is Freakin' ADDICTIVE. I have bought this game on iOS, Android, and now the PC. By far the most addictive game I've ever played. Must stop review, must play the Impossible Game. Buy it, you won't regret it.
This game can make you rage after a while but over all it is a good game
+ Very funny game. + Also a quite cheap game. - Only the fullscreen mode is available because the options don't work. I would like to play this in a smaller window because my monitor is huge.

This game is really hard to play but the controls are quite simple since you only have a jump button. Gameplay wise is not for those people who to like have some fun and be happy but more towards those who likes to challenge their dexterity and mental memory. The music is incredibly good which makes you want to beat the game even more just to listen the entire awesome soundtrack.  The only issue I had this game is that their are some frame skipping or jerking when playing which can make the game a bit harder but less likely to ruined the game. The other problem from this game is that it is not Dxtory friendly which sometimes cause the game to crash if played to long while recording and frame rates tend to be unstable when using Dxtory since usually 2D games should be more stable when recording then 3D ones.  Overall, This game is good for those who like challenges but not for those who always had a bad day.  Anyway, if you guys interested you can watch my gameplay video on the game and see me how frustrated I was playing this game.         YouTube™ Video:  Let's Play The Impossible Game Where The Music is Awesome And The Game Really Hates You
Wait... THEY CHANGED THE LEVEL LAYOUTS?! NNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!

Finally its here xD i was waiting for ever for this to be on pc this game is alot of fun its definitely worth what u pay u will get hours upon hours of fun out of this game and maybe some rage here and there xD

A fun little game that I beat a few years ago on my PSP. Very addictive and frustrating, in a good way. The only downsides are that there seems to be a bit of a blurring issue and it can stutter a little sometimes, not quite sure why that happens. As for the price, $5 might honestly be a bit too much if you're not planning on using the Level Editor because you can pick it up the first 2 levels for $1 and the remaining 3 for another $1 on Android or iOS or for $3 on PSN. Right now the game is on sale for $4 and it's discounted even further down to $3 on the Humble Store, and it is certainly worth it at that price.

After going through 9 ipods, 6 iphones, 4 android phones, 2 keyboard, 1 mouse, 1 moniter and 1 computer, In a period of about a half a year(really happy to see the fact that it came out on steam). I have came to realise that this game is really fun. If you dont mind the downside of loosing your wife and children and all of your money. also if you dont mind being put in a mental hospital after killing someone for distracting you just before you beat the first level. 10/10 would play again.

This Game is Awesome 100/10 because it features a awesome sound track 5 levels including custom levels and just plane awesome things to do is: put gangnam style on a custome level while making the back ground go rainbow 2: When you try too hard at a level eat a burito 3: Go into practice mode and flag Spikes 4: Throw keyboard across the room the end :)

Being a square has never been so cool. Impossible no quite but frustratingly addictive. A word of advice... Stock up on phones, gamepads, Keboards or what ever else you'll use to make this square do its thing...
Well, the developer did not lie - it's impossible. 10/10

This. Damn. Game. Welcome to rage quit heaven, checkpoint hell and sanity disposal. This rythum platformer is all but impossible, but its addictiveness will leave you hidden in your basement until you finish it.
An absolutely great game. Higly addictive to the persistent gamer. 'Just one more try.' is a sentence I keep saying again and again. Give the game a blast and you'll understand exactly what I mean!

This game is so addictive! You can't stop, they only thing that goes through your mind is winning...
Very addicting. Great for my insomnia.
This is unbelievable! Love it :D Haven't finished a single level, but I still love the ♥♥♥♥ out of this game :D Want more levels/music and a better track editor.
Way too addictive!
VERY frustrating, yet very ADDICTIVE!!! 8/10

This game is really hard to play but the controls are quite simple since you only have a jump button. Gameplay wise is not for those people who to like have some fun and be happy but more towards those who likes to challenge their dexterity and mental memory. The music is incredibly good which makes you want to beat the game even more just to listen the entire awesome soundtrack.  The only issue I had this game is that their are some frame skipping or jerking when playing which can make the game a bit harder but less likely to ruined the game. The other problem from this game is that it is not Dxtory friendly which sometimes cause the game to crash if played to long while recording and frame rates tend to be unstable when using Dxtory since usually 2D games should be more stable when recording then 3D ones.  Overall, This game is good for those who like challenges but not for those who always had a bad day.  Anyway, if you guys interested you can watch my gameplay video on the game and see me how frustrated I was playing this game. The game is incredibly fun, but for some reason the Level Editor doesn't work for me. I'll click on the Level Editor, select the folder I want the level in, and it will then take me to the game menu. Other than that, it's incredibly addictive and I recommend it to anyone who is bored.

This game is exactly what you think it is. It's about frustrating you to no small end until you finally rage-quit. The thing is, the game concept is simple and completely fair... by the end, you have no one to blame but your own incompetence. And, in a way, that just makes it worse. A blast to show to a friend.

I always preferred this game over Geometry Dash because it was the first to come out and is simple with awesome misuc and no extra stuff in the background to distract me. The only issues I do have with the game are that it is a bit laggy at times and the level editor needs to have a few more features to be complete.  The editor needs to have an option to set when the music starts and a way to test the level starting at certain points so we don't have to play up until that point to be able to do so.  Other than that it's an amazing game and I would totally recommend it
If you want to be frustrated beyond belief then buy this game. 10/10 would recommend.

One of those fun, simple and challenging games of minimalistic controls and high speed. Here we have a constantly moving block, which can jump each time we press a button, or jump in chains if we hold it.   Most of the gameplay is about memorizing the layout of the stage, and associating it with clues in the background music and level's elements. After enough retries, we are rewarded with a complete stage, an achievement, and some challenge variant of it. It includes 4 levels and potentially- quite a few hours to sink into it. The easiest comparison for me would be the Super Hexagon (cause I don't have geometry dash), wchich also has minimalistic controls, low amount of levels, with spiking but fair difficulty.  And compared to that game, TIG has worse soundtrack (still ok though), worse visuals, and no endless mode. It features a level editor however, with BGM of your chocie (custom mp3).  For a low price it's a fun experience, buuuuuuuuut I happen to have a big issue when it comes to the visual feedback of the game, do not worry- it's very subjective. You see- I have very often played consecutive hours of Super Hexagon, whith my eyes simply growing a little bit tired; when playing TIG however- I suffer a major pain in the eyes, due to them constantly losing focus, and stinging despite regular blinking. This resulted in me not being able to complete anything beyond first level just because it hurt. I have no idea what causes it, but if something with visuals as flashy as SH managed to not give me any similar issues- I guess that there is a probability of the same happening to someone else.  I kinda feel bad for recommending it without being able to complete it, but I know what it offers, I just wasn't able to achieve it. So make sure to pick it at a low price, since it's not a huge effort game, but definitely entertaining.

This game is super addicting and fun to play!!!

'The Impossible Mobile Port'

If you have ever played this game on either android or IOS devices beware! This steam version is very choppy and laggy. Also Ive noticed that the jumps are a bit higher which means two things: its now easier to jump over triple spikes and also like on level 4 it is VERY possible to jump too far which leads to death and restarting and more aggravation. This game is amazing on the IOS device but this steam version? Dont even bother. tl;dr: IOS version is better. Dont waste your money on this poorly ported game.
Fun, but INSANELY glitchy and RAGING!! If you're relaxed and don't care about glitches, definitely buy it, but if not, DONT buy it!!!

This is a fantastic game. I have it on my android and play it quite often. I'm disappointed in the PC version. For some unknown reason no music will play in the menu or in any level but the sound effects from menu selection or hitting triangles in levels do play like normal. I'll try to figure out why but so far I don't recommend getting this. If you want it for 99 cents buy it from the Humble Store. 5 dollars is ridiculous.
Don't Play This Gane It Crashes After 50 Attemps
♥♥♥♥ this game
Buy this game but not on PC. Its not smooth on the PC.
Impossibly choppy game

I like this game. I played the mobile version alot and when I finally saw it on Steam, I immidietly bought it. I was so happy to finally jump over spikes and ontop of blocks with my orange cube, without having to play on a small screen. But what happend. This is a port, yes, but it's not as good as it could be. Some jumps are longer than on the mobile version even though it's the same level designs. for example some places you can hold jumps and it will jump down on the floor and up the next. On this port the next part is further away, making you land on the floor one more time than you should, right infront of a block, causing you to lose. I give this 6/10. I would have given it 9.5/10 if it would have been a better port. But if you want the real experience, don't buy the PC version, buy the Mobile version for iOS and Android.

Really, really hard but fun and with a catchy soundtrack.  Has its fair share of bugs and glitches, however. Audio desync is a constant problem, as is 'jerky' motion. And sometimes the game just stops rendering anything at all and then crashes.  This was originally a positive review but I've had to change it to a negative one due to the extremely blatant and problematic jerkiness. For a game that's so about rhythm, it doesn't actually have one when it runs. It should be smooth but it's not.
